short_summary: Correctional Service of Canada (CSC) needs protective/search gloves for correctional facilities in Laval, Quebec.
description: Requirements include protective/search gloves, optional extensions for additional quantity orders within 36 months after standing offer award, and delivery to Laval, Quebec.
full_summary:
### Government Tender Announcement

####  Title and Reference
Title: RFSO Search Gloves
Reference Number: WS4310176794-Doc4337560385

####  Invitation to Bid
This document invites qualified contractors to submit bids for a Request for Standing Offer (RSO) of Protective/Search Gloves, as outlined in the attached technical specification (Annex B). The solicitation is covered by amendment number 15.

####  Important Dates
*   Publication Date: 2023-12-04
*   Tender Closing Date: 2024-04-03T14:00:00
*   Amendment Date: 2024-03-22
*   Expected Contract Start Date: 2024-01-31
*   Expected Contract End Date: 2027-02-01

####  Contract Details

*   UNSPSC Code: *53100000 (Clothing)
*   Contracting Entity: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
*   Contracting Entity Address: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, QC K1A 0S5, Canada
*   End-User Entity: Correctional Service of Canada (CSC)
*   End-User Entity Address: 340 Laurier Ave W, Ottawa, ON K1P 0P9, Canada

####  Contact Information

Contact Person: Hevey, Mathieu (SPAC/PSPC)
Email: [mathieu.hevey@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:mathieu.hevey@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
Phone: None
Fax: None

####  Trade Agreements and other Dependencies
This tender is governed by the following trade agreements and other dependencies:
*   Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
*   Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
*   Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
*   Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
*   Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
*   Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)
*   Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
*   Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
*   World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
*   North American Free Trade Agreement (NAFTA)
*   Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
*   Canada-Colomb
